name: Reverberation
description: Echoing Reprimand's damage is increased by <dynamic>50% - 120%</dynamic>.

name: Sudden Fractures
description: Serrated Bone Spike's bleed has a <dynamic>3.0% - 10%</dynamic> chance to deal its damage a second time.

name: Septic Shock
description: Sepsis's damage over time is increased by <dynamic>50% - 190%</dynamic>, reduced by 10% each time it deals damage.

name: Slaughter Scars
description: Slaughter's damage and critical strike chance are increased by <dynamic>12% - 40%</dynamic>, or by <dynamic>24%</dynamic> if Slaughter Poison is active.

name: Nimble Fingers
description: Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by <dynamic>5 - 20</dynamic>.

name: Recuperator
description: Slice and Dice heals you for up to <dynamic>18.0% - 54%</dynamic> of your maximum health over 36 sec.

name: Cloaked in Shadows
description: Entering Stealth cloaks you in shadows, absorbing <dynamic>10.0% - 24%</dynamic> of your maximum health in damage, reduced by 1% each second outside of Stealth.

name: Quick Decisions
description:
<spec>Outlaw (Level 18)</spec>
<dynamic>Grappling Hook - Grappling Hook</dynamic>

<spec>Assassination</spec><spec>Subtlety</spec>
<dynamic>Shadowstep</dynamic>

's cooldown is reduced by 10%, and its maximum range is increased by <dynamic>12%</dynamic>.

name: Fade to Nothing
description: Gaining Stealth, Vanish, or Shroud of Concealment increases movement speed by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic> for 3 sec.

name: Rushed Setup
description: The Energy costs of Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Sap, and Distract are reduced by <dynamic>(-- 10)% - (-- 45)%</dynamic>.

name: Prepared for All
description:
Dodging attacks reduces the remaining cooldown of Evasion by <dynamic>1.0 sec - 4 sec</dynamic>.

Successful interrupts with Kick reduce the remaining cooldown of Cloak of Shadows by <dynamic>2.0 sec</dynamic>.

name: Poisoned Katar
description: Fan of Knives's damage is increased by <dynamic>8% - 36%</dynamic>, and it has a <dynamic>8%</dynamic> increased poison application chance.

name: Well-Placed Steel
description: Shiv's damage is increased by <dynamic>100% - 300%</dynamic> on bleeding targets, and it extends the duration of your Envenom by <dynamic>1.0 sec</dynamic>.

name: Maim, Mangle
description: Garrote increases the damage of your Mutilate on the target by <dynamic>20% - 60%</dynamic>.

name: Lethal Poisons
description: The instant damage of your lethal poisons is increased by <dynamic>30% - 100%</dynamic>.

name: Triple Threat
description: Sinister Strike has a <dynamic>20% - 35%</dynamic> chance to strike with both weapons after it strikes an additional time.

name: Ambidexterity
description: Main Gauche has an additional <dynamic>10% - 24%</dynamic> chance to strike while Blade Flurry is active.

name: Sleight of Hand
description: Roll the Bones has a <dynamic>7.0% - 21%</dynamic> chance of instantly resetting its cooldown.

name: Count the Odds
description:
Ambush

<condition>Slaughter</condition>
<dynamic>Slaughter</dynamic>

 and Dispatch have a <dynamic>7.0%</dynamic> chance to grant you a Roll the Bones combat enhancement buff you do not already have for 5 sec.

Duration and chance tripled while Stealthed.

name: Deeper Daggers
description: Eviscerate and Shadow Vault increase your Shadow damage dealt by <dynamic>30% - 150%</dynamic> for 5 sec.

name: Planned Execution
description: Symbols of Death increases your critical strike chance by <dynamic>6.0% - 34%</dynamic>.

name: Stiletto Staccato
description: Shadow Techniques now also reduces the remaining cooldown of Shadow Blades by <dynamic>1.0 sec - 2.5 sec</dynamic>.

name: Perforated Veins
description: Shadowstrike increases the damage of your next Backstab by <dynamic>30% - 100%</dynamic>, stacking up to 3 times.
